thread.section_title: DoYouSpain.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre DoYouSpain.com | doyouspain.com
thread.title: D Roberts

author: D Roberts
title: D Roberts
text: I occasionally shop around to get the best deal on car hire in Spain but always return to DoYouSpain to find that they are the cheapest. I recommend always looking at the small print for the hirers in relation to fuel policy and admin charges, and get a policy to cover any policy excesses in the UK rather than pay the hirers or DYS excess policies. Be prepared and then there are no nasty surprises!
